letter.you-are-invited: You are invited to our wedding
letter.invitation-title: We can't wait to share our special day in Okinawawith you
letter.invitation-quote: You changed my world the moment I met you...

closing-message.title: We Can't Wait to Celebrate
closing-message.quote: Your presence in our lives has been a blessing, and having you celebrate this special day with us would make our joy complete. Thank you for being part of our love story.

dress-code.a: Semi-formal attire is requested. Please avoid wearing white as it is reserved for the bride.

transportation.a: Shuttle service will be available between the ceremony and reception venues.

guest.a: As much as weâ€™d love to celebrate with everyone, space is very limited. We kindly ask for your understanding.

mid-time.q: What should I do between the ceremony and banquet?
mid-time.a: Enjoy a leisurely afternoonâ€”relax, explore Okinawa, or spend time with friends before the evening festivities.

accommodation.a: The ceremony venue is close to Hotel Nikko Alivila, within walking distance, as well as Hoshinoya Okinawa located nearby.

hero.scroll-to-explore: Scroll to explore our love story

couple.title: Meet the Happy Couple
couple.bride-description: A beautiful soul with a heart full of love and dreams of a wonderful future together.
couple.groom-description: A kind and caring partner who brings joy and laughter to every day.
couple.story-text1: Yan and Ming first met at work in Hong Kong. A few years later, fate brought them together again in a bookshop, where a simple encounter blossomed into something beautiful.
couple.story-text2: From Hong Kong to London, their journey has been filled with laughter, adventures, and love. After six wonderful years together, they are now ready to begin their next chapter and would be truly honored to have you witness this moment.

details.title: Wedding Details
details.countdown-subtitle: Every moment brings us closer to our special day
details.join-us-text: Please join us as we exchange vows and celebrate the beginning of our journey together
details.message: Don't miss our special day! Add this event to your calendar and we'll send you a reminder.
details.valet-available: Parking is available at both venues
details.join-us: Join us for our special day!

venue.title: Venue Information
venue.location-subtitle: Join us at these beautiful locations as we celebrate our special day
venue.shuttle-service: Complimentary shuttle service will be provided between the ceremony and reception venues.

gallery.title: Our Memories
gallery.subtitle: A glimpse into our journey together
gallery.journey-subtitle: Take a glimpse into our beautiful love story through these precious moments

schedule.title: Timeline of Events
schedule.vows: The celebration begins as Yan and Ming exchange their vows. Guests are welcome from 1:30 PM.
schedule.photography-caption: Capture the joy of the day with smiles, laughter, and lasting memories.
